SEARCH
Package org.amcp.core

Class Agent

java.lang.Object
org.amcp.core.Agent
public abstract class Agent extends Object
Base class for all AMCP agents. Provides core functionality for agent lifecycle management, event handling, and communication within the agent mesh.
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.5.0
Author:
AMCP Development Team

  • Constructor Details

    • Agent

      protected Agent(String agentId, String agentType)
      Creates a new agent with the specified ID and type.
      Parameters:
      agentId - unique identifier for this agent
      agentType - the type/class of this agent

  • Method Details

    • getAgentId

      public final String getAgentId()
      Gets the unique identifier for this agent.
      Returns:
      the agent ID

    • getAgentType

      public final String getAgentType()
      Gets the type of this agent.
      Returns:
      the agent type

    • getState

      public final org.amcp.core.AgentState getState()
      Gets the current state of this agent.
      Returns:
      the agent state

    • getContext

      protected final AgentContext getContext()
      Gets the agent context for mesh communication.
      Returns:
      the agent context

    • setContext

      public final void setContext(AgentContext context)
      Sets the agent context. Called by the AMCP framework.
      Parameters:
      context - the agent context

    • activate

      public final void activate()
      Activates this agent within the mesh. This method is called by the AMCP framework when the agent is being activated. Subclasses should override onActivation() to perform custom initialization.

    • deactivate

      public final void deactivate()
      Deactivates this agent from the mesh. This method is called by the AMCP framework when the agent is being deactivated. Subclasses should override onDeactivation() to perform custom cleanup.

    • onActivation

      protected void onActivation()
      Called when the agent is being activated. Subclasses should override this method to perform custom initialization such as subscribing to topics and announcing capabilities.

    • onDeactivation

      protected void onDeactivation()
      Called when the agent is being deactivated. Subclasses should override this method to perform custom cleanup such as unsubscribing from topics and releasing resources.

    • subscribe

      protected final void subscribe(String topic)
      Subscribes to events on the specified topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - the topic to subscribe to (supports wildcards)

    • unsubscribe

      protected final void unsubscribe(String topic)
      Unsubscribes from events on the specified topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - the topic to unsubscribe from

    • publish

      public final void publish(Event event)
      Publishes an event to the mesh.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to publish

    • announceCapability

      protected final void announceCapability(String capability, String version)
      Announces a capability of this agent.
      Parameters:
      capability - the capability name
      version - the capability version

    • log

      protected final void log(String message)
      Logs a message with the agent ID as context.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to log

    • log

      protected final void log(String message, Object... args)
      Logs a message with arguments and the agent ID as context.
      Parameters:
      message - the message template
      args - the message arguments

    • getMetadata

      public final Map<String,Object> getMetadata()
      Gets the agent's metadata.
      Returns:
      a copy of the metadata map

    • setMetadata

      protected final void setMetadata(String key, Object value)
      Sets a metadata value.
      Parameters:
      key - the metadata key
      value - the metadata value

    • getSubscriptions

      public final List<String> getSubscriptions()
      Gets the agent's subscriptions.
      Returns:
      a copy of the subscriptions list

    • getCapabilities

      public final Map<String,String> getCapabilities()
      Gets the agent's capabilities.
      Returns:
      a copy of the capabilities map

    • getActivationTime

      public final Instant getActivationTime()
      Gets the time when this agent was activated.
      Returns:
      the activation time, or null if not activated

    • getLastActivityTime

      public final Instant getLastActivityTime()
      Gets the time of the last activity (event published).
      Returns:
      the last activity time

    • handleEvent

      public final void handleEvent(Event event)
      Handles an incoming event. Called by the AMCP framework.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to handle

    • onEventReceived

      protected void onEventReceived(Event event)
      Called when an event is received by this agent. Subclasses should override this method to handle incoming events.
      Parameters:
      event - the received event

    • getId

      public final String getId()
      Convenience method to get agent ID (alias for getAgentId).
      Returns:
      the agent ID

    • getType

      public final String getType()
      Convenience method to get agent type (alias for getAgentType).
      Returns:
      the agent type
